pkgmetadata.longdescription: Manipulate Dates for Finance // Functions to manipulate dates and count days for quantitative finance analysis. The 'quantdates' package considers leap, holidays and business days for relevant calendars in a financial context to simplify quantitative finance calculations, consistent with International Swaps and Derivatives Association (ISDA) (2006) https://www.isda.org/book/2006-isda-definitions/ regulations.
